casebody.data:
No. 11-463. Dolores F. Anderson, aka Dodie Anderson, et al., Petitioners v. National Heritage Foundation, Inc. 565 U.S. 1093, 132 S. Ct. 850,

181 L. Ed. 2d 550,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8930. December 12, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same cases below, 439 Fed. Appx. 238.
